The false claim was published on Faceboo: 2020, and has been shared more than 6,700 times.
The claim included a screenshot of a Fac: language caption that falsely stated that Pakistani lawmaker Nafisa Shah has been receiving welfare payments for the last seven years.
The Benazir Income Support Programme: BISP) is a state-run financial aid scheme in Pakistan, and the claim falsely associated Nafisa Shah with being a beneficiary of this program.
Multiple sources: including the government welfare system chief and the chairperson of the BISP, confirmed that Nafisa Shah is not a beneficiary of the scheme and denied the authenticity of the claim.
